column2: "Afei bosoom a otsia duebien no a ɔno nye bosoom Adar no
column3: ɔnoara mu da a otsia duebiasa no a ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm na n'ahyɛdze no dur dɛ wodzii do no
column4: da no ara na Jewfo hɔn atamfo no enyi daa kwan dɛ wobedzi hɔn do tum; naaso ɔdaan dɛ Jewfo no mbom na wonyaa hɔn a wɔtaan hɔn no do tum."

column2: "Jewfo poon hɔnho hyiaa hɔn nkurow mu
column3: wɔ ɔhen Ahasuerus n'amansin nyinara mu
column4: dɛ wɔrosoɛr etsia hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ hɔn nsɛɛe no do: na nyimpa biara enntum ennsiw hɔn kwan; osiandɛ hɔn ho suro aka ɔman no nyinara."

column2: "Na amansin no mu mbapɔmba
column3: na amansin do ahwɛfo
column5: na hɔn a wɔyɛ ɔhen n'edwuma no nyinara
column6: boaa Jewfo no; osiandɛ Modekai ho suro aka hɔn."

column2: "Na Modekai yɛɛ nyimpa tsitsir wɔ ɔhen no ne fie
column3: na ne nka tahyee amansin no nyinara mu: na ɔbarimba Modekai no kɔr do araa krɔnee."

column2: "Na Jewfo no dze afona ano
column3: na oku na ɔsɛɛ dze kaa hɔn atamfo nyinara gya
column4: na wɔyɛɛ hɔn a wɔtan hɔn no dza wɔpɛ."

column2: "Na Susa ahemfie mu no Jewfo no kumii na wɔsɛɛ mbarimba ahaenum."
"Wokunkum Parsandata
column3: Dalfon

column2: "a wɔyɛ Jewfo tamfo Hamedata ne ba Haman ne mbambanyin du no so
column3: naaso asadze no dze wɔammfa hɔn nsa annka."

column2: "Da no ara hɔn a wokunkum hɔn wɔ Susa ahemfie mu no dodow no wɔdze bɔtoo ɔhen no enyim."
"Na ɔhen no see ɔhembaa Ester dɛ
column3: Jewfo no woekuku na wɔasɛɛ mbarimba ahaenu wɔ Susa ahemfi no mu
column4: na Haman ne mbabanyin du; na ebɛnadze so na wɔayɛ no wɔ ɔhen no n'amansin nkaa no mu? Afei w'adzeserɛ nye dɛn? Na wɔmfa mma wo."

column2: "Nna Ester see dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔhen pɛ a
column4: ɔmma wɔmma Jewfo a wɔwɔ Susa no kwan ma ɔkyena so wɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ndɛ da yi mbra no tse
column5: na ma wɔnsensɛn Haman mbabanyin du no wɔ dua do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ no dɛm: na wɔhyɛɛ mbra wɔ Susa; na wɔsensɛn Haman ne mbabanyin du no."
"Na Jewfo a wɔwɔ Susa no poon hɔnho hyiae wɔ bosoom Adar ne da a otsia duanan no mu so
column3: na wokunkum mbarimba ahaasa wɔ Susa: naaso asadze no dze

column2: "Na Jewfo nkaa no a wɔwɔ ɔhen no n'amansin mu no so poon hɔnho hyiae
column3: na hɔn nkwa ntsi wogyinae
column5: na wokunkum hɔn a wokyiir hɔn no mu nyimpa mpemeduosuon enum; naaso asadze no dze

column2: "Iyi wɔyɛɛ no wɔ bosoom Adar ne da a otsia duebiasa no mu
column3: na ɔnoara ne da a otsia duanan no mu
column5: na wɔyɛɛ no aponto na enyigye da."

column2: "Na Jewfo a wɔwɔ Susa no boaa ano hyiae wɔ ne da a otsia duebiasa no
column3: na ne da a otsia duanan no; na da a otsia duenum no na wɔgyee hɔn ahom
column4: na wɔyɛɛ no aponto na enyigye da."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Jewfo a wɔwɔ nkurobaase no a wɔtsetse nkuroba a wɔammbɔ ho ban no mu no
column3: wɔyɛɛ bosoom Adar ne da a otsia duanan no enyigye na aponto da
column5: na da a wɔdze adze kyekyɛ hɔnho nkorkor."

column2: "Na Modekai kyerɛɛw nsɛm yi
column3: na ɔsomasomae ma wɔdze nwoma kɛmemaa Jewfo nyinara a wɔwɔ ɔhen Ahasuerus n'amansin nyinara mu no
column4: hɔn a wɔbɛn na hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir nyina
column6: "dɛ ɔdze rehyɛ hɔn dɛ wondzi bosoom Adar ne da a otsia duanan na ɔnoara ne da a otsia duenum no
column9: "dɛ nda a Jewfo nyaa mu ahomgye wɔ hɔn atamfo nsamu
column10: na bosoom a wɔdanee fii awerɛhow mu kɔr enyigye mu
column11: na ofi nkɔmbɔdzi mu kɔr da pa mu maa hɔn no: dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ aponto na enyigye nda
column12: na wɔnkyekyɛ hɔnho adze na wɔnkyɛ ehiafo so adze."

column2: "Na Jewfo no suoo mu dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Modekai akyerɛw akɛma hɔn no;"
"osiandɛ Agagnyi Haman
column3: Hamedata ba no
column5: bɔɔ Jewfo no ho pɔw dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn

column2: "na aber a asɛm no dur ɔhen no enyim no
column3: nna ɔnam nwoma do hyɛɛ dɛ no pɔw bɔn a ɔbɔɔ no wɔ Jewfo no ho no ɔnsan mbobua nankasa n'etsifi; na dɛ wɔnsɛn ɔno na ne mba wɔ dua do no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ nda yi Purim dɛ mbrɛ Pur dzin no tse no. Na osian nwoma yi mu nsɛm no nyinara
column3: na dza wohun no wɔ asɛm yi mu
column4: na dza aba hɔn do no ntsi
column9: na hɔn a wɔdze hɔnho kɔbɔɔ hɔn ho no nyinara do
column11: dɛ wobedzi nda ebien yi dɛ mbrɛ hɔn kyerɛw
column12: na hɔn mber a wɔahyɛ no tse

column2: "na dɛ wɔnkaa nda yi
column3: na wondzi no wɔ mbasantsen biara
column7: na dɛ Purim nda yi mma ɔmmpa wɔ Jewfo no mu
column8: na ne nkaa so mmbɔ adze wɔ hɔn asefo mu."

column2: "Nna ɔhembaa Ester
column3: Abihail ne babaa no
column5: wɔdze tum nyinara kyerɛwee dɛ wɔdze Purim nwoma a otsia ebien yi etsim."

column2: "Na ɔsomae ma wɔdze nwoma kɛmemaa Jewfo nyinara
column3: dze kɔr Ahasuerus n'ahendzi amansin ɔha eduonu esuon no mu
column6: "dɛ wɔdze rema Purim nda yi etsim wɔ ne mber a wɔahyehyɛ no mu
column7: dɛ mbrɛ Jewnyi Modekai na ɔhembaa Ester ama etsim hɔn mu no
column8: na dɛ mbrɛ wɔama mbuadadzi na hɔn sufrɛ ho asɛm no mu
column9: ama hɔnho na hɔn asefo no."

column2: "Na Ester ne mbrasɛm no maa Purim nsɛm yi tsimii; na wɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ nwoma no mu."
